title: Please don't let Renekton die!
body:
Hey guys, can we complain together, so Riot has to **buff Renekton?** _[definitly not, because I am low silver and no one would listen to me... :D]_
Seriously, I main him, and right now he loses so many matchups and has no chance to snowball... There are even many enemy teamcombs, wich
let him be **completely useless**.

replies.body:
https://euw.leagueoflegends.com/de/news/game-updates/patch/patchnotizen-724b

>Renekton

>GRUNDWERT FÜR ANGRIFFSSCHADEN 66 ⇒ 69
STEIGERUNG DES ANGRIFFSSCHADENS 3,1 ⇒ 3,75


Gern geschehen
Pff, standard basedmg update... Like every toplaner
